name: Brew and Stew [DEMO]
description:
Brew and Stew is a simple game about managing your very own Medieval Tavern.

Prepare yourself to deal with a storm of very impatient patrons and the impending doom that are the Rush Hours, and hopefully you'll soon learn how to keep your small business from falling apart!

This is the first released Demo of the game, which I've been working on for a little over two weeks as time of writing. Unfortunately my artistic skills are not much to speak of, and the Demo is definitely missing a lot (including some BGM and sounds), but I hope you'll still be able to enjoy the little gameplay loop I've put together!

My hope is to be able to continue updating this project in the following month or two, and then move on to create more small projects akin to this one.

Trello Board if you're interested to know about what I'm currently working on, and what future features I've planned!
